alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Lawrence; Lincoln (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 24 at 5:24PM CDT until March 24 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lincoln County in south central Mississippi... Northwestern Lawrence County in south central Mississippi... Southeastern Copiah County in central Mississippi... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 524 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Brookhaven, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Wesson around 530 PM CDT. Oma around 550 PM CDT. Rockport around 555 PM CDT. Hopewell around 610 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Beauregard and Georgetown. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central and south central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
